original_title: Bitchin': The Sound and Fury of Rick James
overview: This profile of legendary funk/R&B icon Rick James captures the peaks and valleys of his storied career to reveal a complicated and rebellious soul, driven to share his talent with the world.

production_companies.name: Five All in the Fifth Entertainment

tagline: Never mind who you thought he was.
title: Bitchin': The Sound and Fury of Rick James
